column4: I installed the deb of Gimp 2.4 RC2 for Ubuntu Fiesty. How do I run it?
it says it is not installed
but the pkg mgr says it is installed
pastebin the output and then give the url of the pastebin
ok and dpkg -L gimp24 gives you what?
yes if you had paid attention when you installed it originally you would have realized that it installs in /opt
yes I just mean to say in the future
